Text.Page:
Thulsa has Firebase Audacity completely boxed in.

Clear out the {@LinkCreature:52#2006#Cursed Legion dragoons}, {@LinkCreature:52#6002#Thulsan destroyers}, and {@LinkCreature:52#1002#undead polykinds} to give the our troops room to maneuver.

Report to Farida at Firebase Audacity when the mission is complete.

Good job, although you didn't leave many for me!

Now, here's your reward.
I need those {@LinkCreature:52#2006#Cursed Legion dragoons} and {@LinkCreature:52#6002#Thulsan destroyers} off my field.
